channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Florida steakhouse made NYT's top 50 Restaurants List: Where it is
item.description: Florida is full of unique, delicious restaurants and watering holes of all kinds: upscale, casual, beachside eateries, steakhouses, tiki bars perched on bays, roadside barbecue stands, food trucks and so much more.

item.title: Epic Universe wins big at 2025 Golden Ticket Awards. See what it won
item.description: Epic Universehas won theequivalent of an Oscarfor the amusement park industry. Actually, make that four of them.

item.title: The Herald-Tribune Boys Athlete of the Week: Palmetto football player Matthew Hennesey
item.description: Each week during the school year the Sarasota Herald-Tribune selects boys athletes that stood out the week before based on a combination of coach reports and school nominations sent to sports htincoming@gmail.com and our coverage. Those athletes are put in a poll sponsored by Central Florida Behavioral Health Network, Inc. each Monday on heraldtribune.com and you, our readers, vote on who you think did it best.To get to know our winners better, the Herald-Tribune will have a question-and-answer session with each athlete weekly.

item.title: The Herald-Tribune Girls Athlete of the Week: ODA volleyball player Ella Kwon
item.description: Each week during the school year the Sarasota Herald-Tribune selects girls athletes that stood out the week before based on a combination of coach reports and school nominations sent to sports htincoming@gmail.com and our coverage. Those athletes are put in a poll sponsored by Central Florida Behavioral Network, Inc. each Monday on heraldtribune.com and you, our readers, vote on who you think did it best.To get to know our winners better, the Herald-Tribune will have a question-and-answer session with each athlete weekly.

item.title: Three years of Tamiami Trail lane closures to begin on Monday
item.description: Sarasota will begin limiting lanes of Tamiami Trail on Monday as itseeks to replacea critical 60-year-old water main that has started to deteriorate.

item.title: Manatee County plans a small tax cut for the 2026 fiscal year
item.description: Manatee County commissioners approved plans for a$3.58 billion budgetfor the 2026 fiscal year that includes a minor millage rate cut, although the county's massive amount of reserve funds continues to draw scrutiny.

item.title: Nonprofit buys Englewood parcel in prime Florida…
item.description: ENGLEWOOD – The Environmental Conservancy of North Port and Surrounding Areasclosed Sept. 5 on the purchase of a quarter-acre lot in prime Florida Scrub-Jay habitat on Clearwater Street, after raising the $15,000 purchase price.

item.title: Top 5 concerts this week in Sarasota-Manatee
item.description: With the end ofSeptemberand the start of season in the Sarasota area approaching, we have multiple big names in this week's concert picks installment. We start with a Puerto Rican rapper and end with a North Carolina country musician, both rising stars in their respective genres with millions of TikTok followers and monthly Spotify listeners to their names, each playing Sarasota shows.

item.title: Kirk's shooting must force us to fix our toxic political…
item.description: Theshooting death of prominent conservative activist Charlie Kirkon Wednesday afternoon represents the latest, horrific sign of the increasingly dangerous political climate in our country.

item.title: Free festival, Ozzy tribute and more fun Sarasota events…
item.description: Famed Sarasota dining and drinking destination St. Armands Circlewill soon welcome back the Tommy Bahama restaurant and retail store, this time under one roof. But before the highly anticipated opening, you can head there Saturday or Sunday for an arts and crafts festival while visiting other restaurants thriving there, such asColumbiaandCha Cha Coconuts.

item.title: High School Football: Week 4 Sarasota, Manatee game…
item.description: Preview capsules and predictions for high school football games being played by Sarasota and Manatee County teams on Friday, Sept. 12, 2025

item.title: Sarasota murder that shocked 'paradise' in 1995 marks 30-year anniversary
item.description: In 1995, Sarasota was on the precipice of transitioning from being a laid-back beach town, known for its eclectic arts community, to experiencing a development boom that would transform it into the city many know today.

item.title: Conflict of interest questions after commissioner’s employment by exposedMark J. Rochester
item.description: For some time, we've told you that journalism is vital to a healthy democracy. We've talked about how it holds the powerful accountable, gives a voice to the voiceless, and keeps the public informed about what's happening behind the scenes. This month, we gave you a perfect example of what that means in practice.

item.title: Charlie Kirk: Longboat Key's role as a destination for conservatives
item.description: U.S. Representative Vern Buchanan was among those who expressed his sadness over theshooting death of influential conservative activist Charlie Kirkon Wednesday.

item.title: Years of fighting recycling plant in Sarasota has residents hopeless
item.description: In Central Cocoanut, which sits just north of downtown Sarasota, residents are caught in a familiar cycle: They complain about the nearby U.S. Recycling plant, about the dust and the noise they deal with daily. That attracts the attention of local government officials and the media. Promises are made; meetings are held. The attention dies down, local officials and the media move on to something else, promises are forgotten, and all that remains are the residents and the industrial plant.
